caption: When the Blues Go Marching In Book Launch
description: Celebrate 50 years of the St. Louis Blues, at the launch of sports columnist and author Dan O’Neill’s new book, “When the Blues Go Marching In,” which chronicles the team’s history. Hear from O’Neill, moderator Chris Kerber, and Blues alumni regaling the humble beginnings and early expansion-team nights, dramatic ups and downs, and the on-going quest to capture an elusive Stanley Cup Championship. Through stories and photos, “When the Blues Go Marching In” captures the magic—the color, the characters, and the excitement.
message: Enjoy cocktails, dinner and a reception with Dan O'Neill, John Kelly and Bob Plager at the Missouri Athletic Club tonight.
name: St. Louis Blues

caption: When the Blues Go Marching In Book Launch
description: Celebrate 50 years of the St. Louis Blues, at the launch of sports columnist and author Dan O’Neill’s new book, “When the Blues Go Marching In,” which chronicles the team’s history. Hear from O’Neill, moderator Chris Kerber, and Blues alumni regaling the humble beginnings and early expansion-team nights, dramatic ups and downs, and the on-going quest to capture an elusive Stanley Cup Championship. Through stories and photos, “When the Blues Go Marching In” captures the magic—the color, the characters, and the excitement.
message: Bob Plager & John Kelly will be a part of the launch event for "When the Blues Go Marching In" on Oct. 23. atnhl.com/2wSA1ja
name: St. Louis Blues
